title: Maitrea
description: Centrally-located vegetarian restaurant, behind Tyn's Church and one block off Old Town Square. Features a unique, all custom wood interior and buddha water fountain. Offers local Czech hemp beer in addition to a varied menu with tapas, daily specials, hot meals, salads, and desserts. English menu is available. Affiliated with the popular Lehka Hlava-Clear Head restaurant, also in Prague.
